description.zh-cn: 中国物理化学家，曾任东北师范大学教授及校长。主要科研方向为量子化学、富勒烯化学、微观反应动力学和功能材料化学。
description.en: Chinese physical chemist, who served as a professor and president of Northeast Normal University. His main research areas included quantum chemistry, fullerene chemistry, micro-reaction kinetics, and functional materials chemistry.

description.zh-cn: 王荣顺的出生地。
description.en: The birthplace of Wang Rongshun.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省长春市的一所师范大学。
description.en: A normal university located in Changchun, Jilin Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 王荣顺曾就读的中学。
description.en: The high school where Wang Rongshun studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国吉林省长春市的一所综合性大学，王荣顺曾在此进修。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Changchun, Jilin Province, China, where Wang Rongshun pursued advanced studies.

description.zh-cn: 中国理论化学家，王荣顺在吉林大学进修时的导师。
description.en: Chinese theoretical chemist, who was Wang Rongshun's mentor during his advanced studies at Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 应用量子力学原理和方法研究化学问题的学科，是王荣顺的主要研究方向之一。
description.en: A branch of chemistry focused on the application of quantum mechanics to chemical problems, one of Wang Rongshun's main research areas.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的政治运动，期间王荣顺的科研工作中断。
description.en: A political movement in China from 1966 to 1976, during which Wang Rongshun's scientific research was interrupted.

description.zh-cn: 中国自1978年开始实施的一系列经济改革政策，为王荣顺恢复研究工作创造了条件。
description.en: A series of economic reform policies implemented in China since 1978, which created conditions for Wang Rongshun to resume his research.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国伊利诺伊州的公立大学，王荣顺曾在此做高级访问学者。
description.en: A public university in Illinois, United States, where Wang Rongshun was a senior visiting scholar.

nodes.id: 纽约州立大学水牛城分校

zh-cn: 纽约州立大学水牛城分校
en: University at Buffalo, The State University of New York

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州布法罗的公立研究型大学，王荣顺曾在此做高级访问学者。
description.en: A public research university in Buffalo, New York, United States, where Wang Rongshun was a senior visiting scholar.

description.zh-cn: 中国数学家，王荣顺的前任东北师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese mathematician, predecessor of Wang Rongshun as the president of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 中国数学家，王荣顺的继任东北师范大学校长。
description.en: Chinese mathematician, successor to Wang Rongshun as the president of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 一种可充电电池技术。王荣顺及其团队的研究显著提升了其性能。
description.en: A type of rechargeable battery technology. The research by Wang Rongshun and his team significantly improved its performance.

description.zh-cn: 王荣顺出生于江苏金坛。
description.en: Wang Rongshun was born in Jintan, Jiangsu.

description.zh-cn: 1949年考取金坛县中学（现江苏省华罗庚中学）。
description.en: In 1949, he was admitted to Jintan County Middle School (now Jiangsu Hua Luogeng High School).

description.zh-cn: 1953年至1957年在东北师范大学化学系学习。
description.en: Studied at the Department of Chemistry, Northeast Normal University from 1953 to 1957.

description.zh-cn: 在吉林大学化学系进修量子化学。
description.en: Pursued advanced studies in quantum chemistry at the Department of Chemistry, Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 在吉林大学进修期间，师从唐敖庆教授从事量子化学研究。
description.en: During his advanced studies at Jilin University, he studied quantum chemistry under the guidance of Professor Tang Aoqing.

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，王荣顺被迫中断科研，改行教“自然辩证法”。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Wang Rongshun was forced to interrupt his scientific research and switch to teaching 'Dialectics of Nature'.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，王荣顺重新投入了研究工作。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, Wang Rongshun resumed his research work.

description.zh-cn: 王荣顺曾三次在美国南伊利诺伊大学化学系做高级访问学者。
description.en: Wang Rongshun served as a senior visiting scholar at the Department of Chemistry, Southern Illinois University, on three occasions.

relationships.target: 纽约州立大学水牛城分校

description.zh-cn: 王荣顺曾三次在美国纽约州立大学水牛城分校做高级访问学者。
description.en: Wang Rongshun served as a senior visiting scholar at the State University of New York at Buffalo on three occasions.

description.zh-cn: 黄启昌是王荣顺的前任东北师范大学校长。
description.en: Huang Qichang was the predecessor of Wang Rongshun as the president of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 史宁中是王荣顺的继任东北师范大学校长。
description.en: Shi Ningzhong was the successor to Wang Rongshun as the president of Northeast Normal University.

description.zh-cn: 王荣顺和其研究团队将经过特殊处理的聚并苯作为锂离子电池的负极材料，使电池循环寿命、工作电压和比容量等技术指标均高于同类产品。
description.en: Wang Rongshun and his research team used specially treated polyacene as the anode material for lithium-ion batteries, resulting in technical indicators such as cycle life, working voltage, and specific capacity that were superior to similar products.

description.zh-cn: 从1982年开始，王荣顺运用量子化学方法提出“有机导体掺杂导电的双向机制”理论模型，并应用于材料学研究。
description.en: Starting in 1982, Wang Rongshun applied quantum chemistry methods to propose the theoretical model of 'dual-mechanism of doping conductivity in organic conductors' and used it in materials science research.
